com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter.data

Class DataPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter.Plotter
      • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter.data.DataPlotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarPlotter, BufferedLinePlotter, CandlestickPlotter

    public abstract class DataPlotter
extends Plotter
    Base class for data plotters of timed data.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.Color colorBearishEven
      The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period.
      private java.awt.Color colorBearishOdd
      The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an odd period.
      private java.awt.Color colorBullishEven
      The color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an even period.
      private java.awt.Color colorBullishOdd
      The color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an odd period.
      private int[] indexes
      Indexes within the data element used by the plotter.
      private boolean plot
      A boolean to control if the plotter should plot, thus allowing to hide/show plot actions.

    • Field Detail

      • indexes

        private int[] indexes
        Indexes within the data element used by the plotter.

      • colorBearishEven

        private java.awt.Color colorBearishEven
        The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the monththe year.

      • colorBearishOdd

        private java.awt.Color colorBearishOdd
        The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an odd period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the monththe year.

      • colorBullishEven

        private java.awt.Color colorBullishEven
        The color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an even period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the monththe year.

      • colorBullishOdd

        private java.awt.Color colorBullishOdd
        The color used for a bullish line/bar/candle in an odd period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the monththe year.

      • plot

        private boolean plot
        A boolean to control if the plotter should plot, thus allowing to hide/show plot actions.

      • getIndexes

        public int[] getIndexes(Data data)
        Returns the indexes to apply to the data item. By default, all data values.
        Parameters:
        data - The data item.
        Returns:
        The indexes.

        public double[] getValues(Data data)
        Returns the list of values given the data element.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The list of values.

      • plotDataIndex

        public abstract void plotDataIndex(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                                   DataList dataList,
                                   int index)
        Plot a data list item. If the number of data items per plot unit is not -1, the union is plotted.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics object.
        dataList - The data list to plot.
        index - The index to plot.

      • endPlot

        public void endPlot(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Termination method to end the plot and clear or close resources. Overwrite if necessary.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics context.

      • setColorBearishEven

        public void setColorBearishEven(java.awt.Color colorBearishEven)
        Sets the color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period. For periods lower than day, the color changes when the day changes, for the day period when the week changes, for the week the month and for the monththe year.
        Parameters:
        colorBearishEven - The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an even period.

      • setColorBearishOdd

        public void setColorBearishOdd(java.awt.Color colorBearishOdd)

        Parameters:
        colorBearishOdd - The color used for a bearish line bar candle is an odd period.
